name: Level 3 Spellcode
author: N4T_20
description: Pit your shellcoding skills against an admin! May the best spellcoder win. `nc {box} {port}` (NOTE: if you experience issues writing to offset `0` in the shellcode array, try writing to offsets `1` and later. The challenge is solvable without needing that first byte. Edit posted Wednesday morning.)
